LanguageData.MisterHandy.label: Mister Handy
LanguageData.MisterHandy.description: Mister Handy is a very special character representing a series of old robots that were carefully produced and mass-produced throughout Equestria before the war. Even the roles of a butler, doorman, personal bodyguard or doctor are not all that Mister Handy can do in the best way.
LanguageData.MisterHandy.tools.0.label: Left Fist
LanguageData.MisterHandy.tools.1.label: Right Fist
LanguageData.MisterHandy.tools.2.label: Head
